original_title: Fast, Cheap and Out of Sight: Making 'The Invisible Maniac'
overview: a making-of documentary featuring interviews with writer/director Adam Rifkin, executive producer Cassian Elwes, composer Marc David Decker, actress Stephanie Blake, actress Debra Lamb, actor Rod Sweitzer and crew member Dan Povenmire.
title: Fast, Cheap and Out of Sight: Making 'The Invisible Maniac'
